alert.note: Alert for Chester; Hardeman; Henderson; Madison; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 24 at 8:47PM CDT until March 24 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN HENDERSON...NORTHERN HARDEMAN...NORTHWESTERN MCNAIRY...MADISON AND CHESTER COUNTIES... At 846 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Bemis to near Chickasaw State Park to near Silerton, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Henderson, Bolivar, Chickasaw State Forest, Chickasaw State Park, Silerton, Bemis, Masseyville, Blue Goose, Jacks Creek, Mifflin, Cloverport, Mercer, Robertson, McNairy, Bethel Springs, Toone, Hornsby, Finger and Medon. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for west Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
